FuncDef:
The ipv4 unicast command creates and displays the BMP session IPv4 unicast view.
The undo ipv4 unicast command deletes the BMP session IPv4 unicast view. The ipv4 unicast command creates and displays the BMP session IPv4 unicast view. The undo ipv4 unicast command deletes the BMP session IPv4 unicast view. By default, the BMP session IPv4 unicast view does not exist.
ExtraInfo: To create and enter the BMP session IPv4 unicast view, run the ipv4 unicast command in the BMP session view.
